author: pakhotin
body:
This is NEW pull request following previous made by Anthony:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/8310

New pull request includes several changes to the ALCARECO Producers used by during MuonAlignment:
- changed thresholds pT and eta for muons and general tracks (!)
- added several new collections to the output files (tracks, vertexes, etc.)
- changed some of the detector DCS status flags
- fixed a bug that existed in the Overlaps stream during Run-1
  Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_5_X #9482 (original by @pakhotin).
title: Muon alignment alcareco producers for run2 v2
